ENTRY.SYNOPSIS: Constant temperature, plane-parallel shock plasma model. XSpec model.

DESC.PARA: Constant temperature, plane-parallel shock plasma model. The references for this model can be found in the help file for the xsequil model.
This is an additive model component.
